housingTiers.label: Survival Housing
housingTiers.description: Shared rooms, hostels, or the cheapest possible shelter. Focus on basic safety and legality.
housingTiers.scenario: Shared bedroom in a house with multiple roommates
housingTiers.location: Outskirts of low-cost cities, less desirable areas

items.title: Shared Room
items.description: Bunk bed or single bed in a shared bedroom with 1-3 other people. Minimal privacy.
items.brands: Generic furniture from thrift stores, Facebook Marketplace, or hand-me-downs

items.title: Communal Bathroom
items.description: Shared with multiple people, basic fixtures, possibly older and showing wear. Hot water may be limited.
items.brands: Standard builder-grade fixtures (e.g., Glacier Bay)

items.title: Shared Utilities
items.description: Split electricity, water, and gas. Internet is likely the lowest-tier plan, shared among all residents.
items.brands: Local utility companies, budget ISPs (e.g., Xfinity Prepaid, CenturyLink)

items.title: Heating/Cooling
items.description: Often no central air. Heating may be from old radiators or space heaters (fire hazard). Window AC units are rare.
items.brands: No-name space heaters

items.title: Basic Construction
items.description: Older building, possibly with poor insulation leading to high utility bills. Thin walls with poor soundproofing.
items.brands: Basic wood frame, vinyl or aluminum siding

items.title: Doors & Windows
items.description: Hollow-core interior doors, single-pane windows that may be drafty. Basic lock on the front door.
items.brands: Generic, mass-produced hardware

items.title: Minimal Security
items.description: A lock on the front door. Individual bedroom doors may not have locks. No formal security system.
items.brands: Basic deadbolt (e.g., Kwikset)

housingTiers.label: Minimal Housing
housingTiers.description: Studio apartments or small shared spaces. Very basic but private.
housingTiers.scenario: Small studio apartment or efficiency unit in an older building

items.title: Studio/Efficiency
items.description: A small, private space combining a bedroom, living area, and kitchenette.
items.brands: Self-assembled furniture (IKEA, Wayfair), Target basics

items.title: Kitchenette
items.description: Compact kitchen area with a mini-fridge, two-burner stove, and possibly a microwave. Counter space is minimal.
items.brands: Apartment-sized appliances from brands like Hotpoint, Danby, or Magic Chef

items.title: Private Bathroom
items.description: A small, private bathroom with a shower-tub combo, toilet, and sink. Basic and functional.
items.brands: Basic fixtures, likely laminate countertop

items.title: Coin-Operated Laundry
items.description: Access to a shared laundry room in the basement or a nearby laundromat.
items.brands: Commercial machines from Speed Queen or Maytag

items.title: Mailbox
items.description: A designated mailbox for the unit, typically in a shared lobby area.
items.brands: Standard USPS-approved mailboxes

items.title: Individual Meter
items.description: Utilities are typically metered and paid for by the tenant. Internet is self-provisioned.
items.brands: Standard local utilities

items.title: Window AC Unit
items.description: Basic cooling provided by a tenant-supplied or landlord-provided window or wall unit.
items.brands: Frigidaire, LG basic models, Midea

housingTiers.label: Basic Apartment
housingTiers.description: One-bedroom apartment with standard amenities. Safe and functional.
housingTiers.scenario: One-bedroom apartment in an average neighborhood or a dated two-bedroom
housingTiers.location: Suburban areas, smaller cities, working-class neighborhoods

items.title: Separate Bedroom
items.description: A private bedroom with a door and a dedicated closet.
items.brands: Ashley Furniture, Wayfair, Rooms To Go

items.title: Full Kitchen
items.description: A complete kitchen with a full-size refrigerator, oven, four-burner stove, and some counter space.
items.brands: Whirlpool, Frigidaire, Amana, GE standard models

items.title: Living Room
items.description: A dedicated living area separate from the bedroom.
items.brands: Furniture from Target, IKEA, HomeGoods, Big Lots

items.title: On-Site Laundry
items.description: An on-site laundry room or in-unit washer/dryer hookups.
items.brands: Speed Queen, Maytag community machines

items.title: Off-Street Parking
items.description: An assigned parking spot or access to a shared lot. Usually uncovered.
items.brands: Standard parking facilities

items.title: Property Management
items.description: Managed by a company rather than a single landlord, which can mean more standardized service.
items.brands: Local or regional property management groups

items.title: Standard Finishes
items.description: Builder-grade carpet in bedrooms, vinyl or laminate flooring elsewhere. Laminate countertops.
items.brands: Shaw carpeting, Formica countertops

items.title: Basic Insulation
items.description: Meets basic code requirements, but may not be efficient. Double-pane windows are common.
items.brands: Standard fiberglass insulation

housingTiers.label: Comfortable Living
housingTiers.description: A nice apartment or small house with good amenities and a pleasant lifestyle.
housingTiers.scenario: A modern two-bedroom apartment or a small, older single-family house for rent

items.title: Two Bedrooms & Defined Spaces
items.description: A master bedroom plus an office/guest room. A separate dining area is common.
items.brands: West Elm, CB2, Pottery Barn basics, Crate & Barrel

items.title: Updated Kitchen
items.description: Modern appliances, good counter space, a dishwasher, and a garbage disposal.
items.brands: Samsung, LG, Bosch, Whirlpool mid-range appliances

items.title: Central Air/Heat (HVAC)
items.description: A central HVAC system for comfortable and consistent climate control.
items.brands: Carrier, Trane, Lennox standard models

items.title: In-Unit Laundry
items.description: A washer and dryer within the apartment or house.
items.brands: Whirlpool, Samsung, Maytag mid-range units

items.title: Patio/Balcony
items.description: A private outdoor space large enough for a small grill and seating.
items.brands: Standard construction with a sliding glass door

items.title: Community Amenities
items.description: Access to a shared community swimming pool and possibly a small, basic fitness room.
items.brands: Standard pool and gym maintenance

items.title: Controlled Access
items.description: Key fob or intercom system for building entry, enhancing security.
items.brands: Generic security systems

housingTiers.label: Upscale Living
housingTiers.description: A high-quality apartment or a nice house with premium features, often owned.
housingTiers.scenario: A luxury apartment in a new complex or a 3-bedroom house in a good school district

items.title: Three Bedrooms / Master Suite
items.description: A master suite with an attached bathroom, plus additional bedrooms for family or other uses.
items.brands: Pottery Barn, Williams Sonoma Home, Restoration Hardware

items.title: Gourmet Kitchen
items.description: Granite or quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, a kitchen island, and a pantry.
items.brands: KitchenAid, Bosch, Samsung Bespoke, Jenn-Air

items.title: Upgraded Finishes
items.description: Hardwood or high-quality LVP flooring, solid-core doors, and upgraded lighting fixtures.
items.brands: Bruce or Mohawk flooring, Kichler lighting

items.title: Modern Fitness Center
items.description: A well-equipped community gym with cardio machines, weights, and possibly a yoga studio.
items.brands: Life Fitness, Precor, Peloton bikes

items.title: Resort-Style Pool
items.description: A large community pool area with a hot tub, sundeck, cabanas, and grilling stations.
items.brands: High-quality pool construction and maintenance

items.title: Clubhouse & Package Room
items.description: A residents' lounge for events and a secure package room or locker system.
items.brands: Luxer One or Amazon Hub package lockers

items.title: Basic Smart Home Features
items.description: A smart thermostat, smart locks, and USB-enabled outlets for convenience.
items.brands: Nest, Ecobee thermostats; August, Schlage smart locks

items.title: High-Speed Internet Ready
items.description: Building is wired for fiber-optic internet, offering top-tier speeds.
items.brands: AT&T Fiber, Google Fiber, Verizon Fios

housingTiers.label: Luxury Living
housingTiers.description: Premium housing with high-end finishes and exclusive amenities in prime locations.
housingTiers.scenario: A luxury high-rise apartment or a spacious executive home
housingTiers.location: Prime downtown areas, exclusive historic neighborhoods

items.title: Expansive Master Suite
items.description: A large bedroom with a sitting area, a custom walk-in closet, and a spa-like en-suite bathroom.
items.brands: California Closets, Restoration Hardware, Room & Board

items.title: Chef's Kitchen
items.description: Professional-grade appliances, custom cabinetry, quartz or marble countertops, and a built-in wine fridge.
items.brands: Sub-Zero, Wolf, Miele, Thermador appliances

items.title: Spa-like Bathroom
items.description: An en-suite bathroom with a large freestanding soaking tub, a rainfall shower with multiple body jets, and dual vanities.
items.brands: Kohler, Toto, Hansgrohe fixtures; marble or porcelain tile

items.title: Concierge & Doorman
items.description: 24/7 front desk staff, doorman, and concierge services for reservations, package handling, etc.
items.brands: Managed by high-end property management firms like Greystar or Related

items.title: Rooftop Terrace
items.description: A well-appointed shared rooftop with stunning views, an outdoor kitchen, fire pits, and luxury lounge furniture.
items.brands: High-end outdoor furniture from brands like RH Outdoor

items.title: Valet Parking & EV Charging
items.description: Convenient valet service for residents and guests, and dedicated EV charging stations.
items.brands: Third-party valet services, Tesla or ChargePoint chargers

items.title: Integrated Smart Home
items.description: Automated lighting, climate control, motorized shades, and integrated audio systems.
items.brands: Lutron lighting, Sonos audio, smart shades from Hunter Douglas

items.title: High-Efficiency Systems
items.description: Multi-zone HVAC for personalized climate control, and a tankless water heater for endless hot water.
items.brands: High-end Carrier or Trane systems, Rinnai tankless heaters

housingTiers.label: High-End Luxury
housingTiers.description: Bespoke real estate with designer finishes, unique architectural features, and personalized services.
housingTiers.scenario: A sub-penthouse, a designer home in an elite neighborhood, or a historic brownstone
housingTiers.location: Elite urban neighborhoods (e.g., SoHo, Beverly Hills), waterfront properties

items.title: Custom Interior Design
items.description: Spaces designed by a recognized interior design firm with custom-built furniture and commissioned art.
items.brands: Furniture from Design Within Reach, Ligne Roset; custom millwork

items.title: Walk-in Wine Cellar
items.description: A climate-controlled wine cellar or a large-format wine wall for displaying a significant collection.
items.brands: Sub-Zero or Perlick wine preservation, custom cellars by Grotto

items.title: Dedicated Home Theater
items.description: A soundproofed media room with tiered seating, a projection screen, and a high-fidelity surround sound system.
items.brands: Sony 4K projectors, Bowers & Wilkins or Focal speakers, Kaleidescape movie servers

items.title: Full Home Automation
items.description: A fully integrated smart home ecosystem controlling lighting, shades, AV, security, and climate from a central interface.
items.brands: Control4, Crestron, Savant systems

items.title: Advanced Security System
items.description: A comprehensive security system with high-definition cameras, motion sensors, and 24/7 professional monitoring.
items.brands: ADT premium, Vivint Pro, professionally installed systems

items.title: Premium Materials
items.description: Use of natural stone slabs (marble, quartzite), exotic woods for flooring and cabinetry, and designer hardware.
items.brands: Plumbing fixtures from Waterworks or Dornbracht; hardware from Rocky Mountain Hardware

items.title: Floor-to-Ceiling Windows
items.description: Expansive glass walls and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize views and natural light.
items.brands: High-end window systems from brands like Pella Architectural or Andersen E-Series

items.title: Outdoor Kitchen
items.description: A fully equipped outdoor kitchen with a high-end grill, refrigerator, sink, and stone countertops.
items.brands: Grills from Viking, Lynx, or Kalamazoo Outdoor Gourmet

housingTiers.label: Ultra-Luxury
housingTiers.description: Exceptional properties with world-class amenities, extensive space, and on-demand services.
housingTiers.scenario: A full-floor penthouse, a luxury estate with guest house, or a waterfront villa
housingTiers.location: Most prestigious addresses in major world cities (e.g., Park Avenue, Knightsbridge)

items.title: Multiple Bedroom Suites
items.description: Dual master suites each with spa-like en-suite baths, dressing rooms, and private terraces.
items.brands: Custom millwork, Italian marble slabs, walk-in closets by Poliform or Molteni&C

items.title: Professional & Catering Kitchens
items.description: A primary show kitchen with restaurant-quality appliances, plus a separate, hidden catering kitchen for staff.
items.brands: La Cornue, Gaggenau, Hestan, separate Sub-Zero fridge/freezer columns

items.title: Private Fitness & Wellness Center
items.description: A fully equipped gym with cardio and strength training, plus a dedicated yoga/pilates studio.
items.brands: Technogym Personal Line, The Mirror, a Kinesis wall

items.title: Private Spa Facilities
items.description: An in-residence spa with a sauna, steam room, massage room, and a cold plunge pool.
items.brands: Custom installations by Finnleo or Steamist; massage tables by Oakworks

items.title: Private Pool & Cabana
items.description: An indoor or outdoor infinity-edge pool with spa features, a cabana with a changing room and bar.
items.brands: Endless Pools, custom gunite pool construction

items.title: Entertainment Wing
items.description: A dedicated area with a billiards room, a golf simulator, and a wet bar.
items.brands: Brunswick tables, TrackMan or Golfzon simulators

items.title: Advanced Climate & Air
items.description: Geothermal heating and cooling, radiant floor heating, and a hospital-grade HEPA air filtration system.
items.brands: Systems designed by engineering firms

items.title: Power & Water Redundancy
items.description: A backup generator capable of powering the entire home and a whole-house water filtration system.
items.brands: Generac or Kohler whole-home generators

housingTiers.label: Elite Residential
housingTiers.description: World-class properties that are landmarks in their own right, offering every conceivable luxury and service.
housingTiers.scenario: A trophy penthouse across multiple floors or a historic estate on significant acreage
housingTiers.location: Exclusive enclaves (e.g., The Hamptons, Bel Air), prestigious global addresses

items.title: Grand Entertainment Spaces
items.description: A formal ballroom, a grand salon for receiving guests, a formal dining room for 20+, and a private library/office.
items.brands: Bespoke architectural elements, custom furniture from renowned designers

items.title: Separate Guest House
items.description: A detached, fully-equipped guest house with multiple bedrooms and its own kitchen and living area.
items.brands: Furnished to the same standard as the main residence

items.title: Collector's Garage/Gallery
items.description: A climate-controlled, 10+ car garage designed as a gallery to display a vehicle collection, with a turntable and detailing station.
items.brands: Custom garage design by firms like Garage Living

items.title: Professional Wine Cellar & Tasting Room
items.description: A large-scale, professionally managed wine cellar with capacity for thousands of bottles and an associated tasting room.
items.brands: Custom cellars by Sommi Wine Cellars, Coravin wine preservation systems

items.title: Smart Window Technology
items.description: Electrochromic smart glass that tints on demand for privacy and energy efficiency, and acoustically insulated windows.
items.brands: SageGlass or View smart glass

items.title: On-Site Staff Offices
items.description: Dedicated office space for a full-time estate manager and other administrative staff.
items.brands: Equipped with business-grade technology

items.title: Catering & Event Infrastructure
items.description: A dedicated service entrance, a large catering kitchen, and storage for event supplies, designed to host large functions seamlessly.
items.brands: Commercial-grade equipment

housingTiers.label: Ultra High Net Worth
housingTiers.description: Extraordinary private compounds and estates with bespoke services and amenities that rival luxury hotels.
housingTiers.scenario: A multi-structure luxury compound with extensive grounds and dedicated staff
housingTiers.location: Private islands, most exclusive neighborhoods worldwide (e.g., Monaco, Lake Como)

items.title: Professionally Landscaped Grounds
items.description: Acres of grounds with formal gardens, water features, outdoor sculptures, and walking trails, designed by a world-renowned landscape architect.
items.brands: Work by firms like Wirtz International or Reed Hilderbrand

items.title: Dedicated Staff Quarters
items.description: Separate, private, and comfortable accommodations for a full-time, live-in household staff.
items.brands: A dedicated building or wing designed for staff privacy and comfort

items.title: Private Sporting Facilities
items.description: A professional-grade tennis court with a pavilion, and possibly a basketball court or a small private golf green.
items.brands: Professional court construction by specialists like Har-Tru

items.title: Full Household Staff
items.description: A complete team including an estate manager, private chef, butlers, housekeepers, and groundskeepers.
items.brands: Staff sourced from elite agencies like The British Butler Institute

items.title: Dedicated Security Team
items.description: An on-site, 24/7 security team operating from a dedicated command center with advanced surveillance and access control.
items.brands: Security managed by firms like Gavin de Becker & Associates or Kroll

items.title: Equestrian Facilities
items.description: For properties with extensive grounds, a state-of-the-art stable, paddocks, and private riding trails.
items.brands: Custom-built stables by companies like Morton Buildings

items.title: Private Observatory
items.description: For estates in low light-pollution areas, a private observatory with a research-grade telescope.
items.brands: Telescopes from PlaneWave Instruments

housingTiers.label: Billionaire Class
housingTiers.description: The absolute pinnacle of residential living. A self-sufficient, private world with unlimited customization and security.
housingTiers.scenario: A multi-acre, multi-residence estate or a 'trophy' penthouse occupying the top floors of a supertall skyscraper
housingTiers.location: The world's most prestigious and secure addresses (e.g., The Peak in Hong Kong, private atolls)

items.title: Private Helipad
items.description: A personal, fully-approved helicopter landing area for seamless and private travel.
items.brands: FAA/EASA-approved construction and lighting systems

items.title: Private Museum/Art Gallery
items.description: Museum-quality spaces to house private collections of art, cars, or artifacts, with extreme security and climate control.
items.brands: Professional gallery lighting, security, and curation services

items.title: Private Spa & Wellness Complex
items.description: A comprehensive spa with multiple treatment rooms, a hammam, salon, cryotherapy chamber, and float tanks.
items.brands: Equipment from Gharieni, KLAFS, and other top-tier spa outfitters

items.title: IMAX Private Theatre
items.description: A certified, private IMAX theatre for the ultimate cinematic experience.
items.brands: IMAX Private Theatre division

items.title: Starchitect-Designed Architecture
items.description: A completely custom, one-of-a-kind property designed by a Pritzker Prize-winning architect.
items.brands: A unique creation by architects like Norman Foster, Kengo Kuma, or the estate of Zaha Hadid

items.title: Rare & Exotic Materials
items.description: Use of materials so rare they are almost unattainable, such as book-matched marble from a single quarry block or exotic wood from protected sources.
items.brands: Sourced by specialists from around the world

items.title: Fortified Safe Wing
items.description: Beyond a panic room, an entire wing of the house is a fortified, self-sufficient safe area with its own power, air, water, and communications.
items.brands: Custom-built by elite global security contractors

items.title: Independent Infrastructure
items.description: The estate can operate completely off-grid with its own power generation (solar + battery + generator), water purification, and waste treatment facilities.
items.brands: Industrial-grade systems from companies like Tesla, Caterpillar

items.title: Biometric & Anti-Drone Security
items.description: Biometric access control for all sensitive areas and anti-drone detection and defense systems.
items.brands: Systems from companies like Dedrone

designThemes.description: Simple, functional design focusing on affordability
Clean, modern aesthetic with comfort in mind
